choices: A wish made on a shooting star
1.content: What kind of situation will happen with Nick and Judy?
1.title: Situation?

11.content:
Everyone in Zootopia had heard the old story.

"Back in medieval times, a bunny alchemist had created a special stone. Not the Philosopher's Stone; a different one.
Imbued with immense magical power, the stone would give the alchemist the power to change, alter and transform everything around him as he pleased, whenever he held the stone tightly.

However; fearing that unscrupulous mammals might use it for evil purposes, the alchemist hid the stone somewhere and managed to find a way to depower the stone for centuries. He then disappeared, never to be heard from again..."

To every mammal in Zootopia, this was nothing more than an old legend. However; what nobody knew, was that the story was actually real!

The only reason the stone had not been discovered before, was thanks to the alchemist rendering it powerless. But now the enchantment was about to wear off and it did so in the paws of two of Zootopia's finest police officers: the bunny Judy Hopps and her partner Nick Wilde!

The two mammals were in for a truly crazy adventure; filled with alterations, swaps, transformations and all kind of awkward situations...

But how exactly did these two mammals find the stone?

Story 1: After a raid on a crooked collector, Judy discovers that the stone has fallen into her pocket. Showing it to Nick, the two friends quickly find out what the stone can do, but in an awkward way...

Story 2: Acting on a tip from Fennic, Nick single-pawed busts a jewelry-smuggling operation. However, one of the jewels is really the stone and when the ZPD can't find an owner, Nick brings it home with him...

Story 3: While on vacation on her own, Judy suddenly stumbles across some ancient ruins, finding the stone inside...

Story 4: Getting a call from a construction site, Judy and Nick discover that the crew have dug up some ancient artifacts. Whith all the artifacts identified, exept for the stone, Chief Bogo allow Judy and Nick to keep it as a souvenir of sorts. But they are in for a surprise when they come home...
11.title: A glowing stone

choices: They become each other, in some way
111.content:
Judy was exhausted. Today had been a very busy day for the ZPD's bunny officer.

A raid on a crooked antiques dealer, which the First Precinct had been setting up for months, had gone down today and while the dealer and his henchmen had all been arrested, the sheer amount of adrenaline she had experienced during the raid, had left her really tired. So tired, that her partner, the fox Nick Wilde, had had to drive her home to her new apartment. (A gift from the re-instated Mayor Lionheart for saving Zootopia from Bellwether's plot.)

When they arrived, Nick followed Judy inside. While Judy was still wearing her police uniform, Nick had already switched to his casual outfit.

Shooting a glance at his partner, Nick playfully said: "What's the matter, Carrots? I thought rabbits had lots of energy."

"Please; no rabbit-jokes tonight, Nick," groaned Judy. "Not like you can talk; I can see that the raid took it's toll on you, too."

"Alright, you got me there," admitted Nick. "But I really eanted to make sure you got home okay before going home myself."

"Thanks, Nick," said Judy. "But I'm just tired, not injured. You didn't have to..." She trailed off as she suddenly felt something in one of her pockets. Pulling it out, she saw that it was some kind of shiny stone.

"What'cha got there, Carrots?" asked Nick.

"I don't know," said Judy. "It must have fallen into my pocket when I bumped into that shelf during the raid."

Judy studied the stone a bit more. 'I'm sure I've heard something about a stone before, but I can't quite remember where...' thought Judy.

"Well, stone or not, I'd better get back home," said Nick.

"Not yet," replied Judy. "We have to figure out what kind of antique this is."

"Can't we do that tomorrow," asked Nick. "Besides, I thought you were tired."

"I am," replied Judy, "but it's important that we identify this stone as fast as possible, to determine whether it's stolen or not."

When Nick let out another groan, Judy began to get a little annoyed with her friend and partner. Gripping the stone hard, she thought: ' That dumb fox. If only...'
-----------
What did Judy think? It determines what kind of change will happen.

Choice 1: '...he knew what I was going through sometimes!' This causes Nick and Judy to somehow become each other! Could be through body-swapping, life-swapping, or something even crazier.

Choice 2: '...he knew what it was like to be a bunny!' This causes Nick and Judy to swap species; making Nick a bunny and Judy a fox!

Or, do you want a different kind of change?
111.title: Story 1: The Collector's Strange Stone

1111.content:
In what way does Judy and Nick 'become each other?'

First up; there's the old fashioned body-swap option, where Nick ends up in Judy's body and Judy ends up in Nick's body.
Naturally, they will both likely freak out; not only because they are now a different species, but also because they are now a different gender!

However, there's also a crazier option: in which Nick and Judy now think that they are really each other; i.e. Nick thinks that he is actually the female bunny Judy, while Judy thinks that she is really the male fox Nick!
This is only a mental change, so their bodies won't change at all; so, even though she is still a bunny in body, Judy will think that she really has Nick's body, since she thinks she is Nick (and vice versa for Nick.)
Also; since no physical changes will occur when the change happens, both Judy and Nick (thinking that they are really each other), will be appalled over wearing 'each others clothes', even though it is really their own.
Ergo: even though their clothes fits then perfectly, Judy (thinking she's really Nick) and Nick (thinking he's really Judy) both believe the Stone swapped their clothes and nothing else and swap their clothes 'back', which results in 'Nick' (Judy) wearing clothes that are oversized on 'his' (her) body, while 'Judy' (Nick) wears clothes that are quite small for 'her' (him)!

So; which of these options do you like the most?
1111.title: They become each other, in some way

choices: Nick and Judy freak out over being in each others bodies
Judy and Nick manage to stay calm and try to figure out what happened
11111.content:
'If only he knew what I was going through sometimes!' As soon as Judy had thought those words, she suddenly noticed that the stone was starting to glow.

"Uh, Carrots?" asked Nick, who had also seen the glow of the stone. "What's with the light-show?"

Judy just managed to say: "I have no idea," before the light from the stone grew so bright that it completely filled the apartment and forcing the two mammals to shut their eyes in the face of it.

A strange feeling enveloped the two mammals. It was like they were being sucked up into a vacuum cleaner and then spit back out again. As the strange feeling disappeared, so did the light.

Judy was the first to recover. She opened her eyes, but couldn't see anything other than a vague, gray blob. Since her vision was still blurry, so she blinked a few times to make it go away. She noticed how the gray blob became gradually clearer, until she was looking at.... herself???

This was a weird situation for Judy. How could she be looking at herself? Even more puzzling was the fact that the other Judy seemed to be smaller than her.

Judy watched as the other her stared up at her and then asked: "Why am I seeing myself?" It was such a strange question; but it was even stranger that the other Judy suddenly moved her paw to her throat, like she was surprised by her own voice.

"I could be asking the same..." was all Judy managed to say before she apruptly cut off. Her voice sounded a lot deeper than it usually did.

As Judy stood pondering over this, she watched the other Judy first looking at her, then looking down at herself, before turning wide-eyed and white as though the other her had just seen a ghost.

A look of dawning realization flickered across the other Judy's face, before being replaced with a look of nervousness.

Judy watched as the other Judy looked up at her again and said: "Is that you, Carrots?"

Judy's eyes went wide. There was only one mammal in Zootopia that called her that...

"Nick?" she asked the other bunny in her new voice. The other Judy nodded. "But... how come you look like me?"

"I was about to ask you that, too," said Judy's clone, whom she now knew to be Nick.

It took a moment before the full meaning of Nick's words sank in. And it lead Judy to see a very disturbing pattern. The fact that her 'other self'/Nick seemed to be smaller than udual, the strange feeling from when they were in the light, her new deeper voice, Nick now looking like her... it all added up to one undeniable solution.

Swallowing, Judy looked down at herself and gasped. Instead of the ZPD uniform and grey-furred foot-paws that she was used to seeing, she instead saw a green Hawaiian shirt, an indigo necktie, khaki pants and red-furred foot-paws.

The realization hit Judy like a ton of bricks. Somehow, she and her partner had swapped bodies!!!

The following scream could be heard across all of Zootopia.


What happens next?
11111.title: Freaky Fox-and-Bunny Day...

choices: Doesn't find the stone, it rolls through a crack in the floorboards!
Discovers the stone is gone! Vanished after the wish!
111112.content:
"Okay," Judy, now in the body of Nick, said to calm themselves down. "We can't just sit here and panic. We need to do something about this."

"You're right," Nick replied, placing the floor while trying not to trip over his new giant rabbit feet. "People swap bodies all the time! I'm sure there's a perfectly logical explanation to all this."

It was bizarre to hear Nick's usual sarcastic quips coming out of her own mouth. Though he was making some sense. There had to be a reason for the sudden change, it shouldn't have happened for no reason. Judy shifted on her own new feet, trying to become more comfortable in the idea that she was a taller and slimmer fox. Being male was also something that was going to take some getting used to. She hoped that they could solve this problem before one of them had to go to the bathroom.

As Judy flexed her new paws, she suddenly found them rather empty.

"The stone..."

"What?" Nick asked, rabbit ears picking up what she had quietly mumbled. "The stone we found? Carrots, you don't think..."

"I had wished that you could know what I was going through sometimes," Judy explained. "But it was in my own head! I didn't think it would actually do...This!"

"Well, then all we have to do is find it and undo this by wishing the opposite. Problem solved. Where did you put it?"

"I just had it in my paw when I made the wish. But that was when I was in your body. I mean, my body. You don't have it?"

Nick checked both of his paws but was holding nothing. "It must have gotten dropped when that flash of light happened. Or maybe it just evaporate entirely."

"Don't say things like that! Let's look around, we'll find it."

Before they could both go to the floor, there was a familiar ringtone humming in the apartment. Nick felt around his back pockets and produced Judy's cellphone.

"It's your parents."

"Well, answer it."

"Are you crazy? The last time I talked to them, I'm pretty sure your dad thought I was trying to eat you!"

"Nick, you're me now. And unless we want everyone freaking out, you need to suck it up and work out your problems with dad. I'll look for the stone, you talk to my parents."

Nick groaned as the call went to video on NuzzleTime. "Oh...Hey. It's, uh, it's my parents..."

"Hi, Jude! Is this a good time? We have some big news!"

"Oh," Nick looked to Judy for guidance. She just shooed him along. "Suuuure. Why not?"

While Nick was busy pretending to be amazed that someone in the family was having another litter of Hopps, Judy scoured the floor for any signs of the stone. Unfortunately, Judy's apartment wasn't built for foxes and she was feeling more cramped than usual as she ducked under her bed. This entire situation was easily the most bizarre thing that had ever happened to her and it was about to get even worse if she didn't find that stone. Judy shuddered to think what might go wrong if it landed in the wrong paws, even if its only power was swapping bodies.

As their search continued, Judy...
111112.title: Keep Calm and Carry On

choices: They see Judy's body as Judy, confusing Nick and the real Judy
They see Nick's body as Judy
11112.content:
There was only a second for the duo to process as the stone suddenly emitted a bright light. They both covered their eyes instinctively, attempting to save their precious pupils from harm. Yet as quickly as it appeared, the light vanished. They slowly removed their hands, looking around curiously, looking for whatever the stone might have done. As far as they can perceive, the magic it wound was relatively mundane.

As far as they could perceive.

"Well, would you look at that, Carrots," Judy slouched her shoulders, grinning at Nick with a smug grin. "Your little stone is a magic clothes swapper. What a handy little tool."

Nick's body sighed, resting a hand on his hip. "We come across magic and you're going to sass about it?"

"I don't sass. I snark. There's a difference.

"Either way, it's clearly done something magical, Nick. That's an important discovery! Something that, as far as I'm concerned, means it gets filled into evidence asap."

The rabbit shrugged. "Suit yourself. As long I get changed back into something more my style and can clock off, that's all fine by me."

Judy huffed, crossing Nick's arms. "You better not stretch my uniform..."

"I could take it off, if you'd prefer."

She groaned, already moving to the car. "Don't even joke about that..."

Judy's body laughed. Silly rabbit. With a slightly bigger bounce in his step than he seemed to recall, Nick followed what he believed to be a rabbit into the patrol car. "Where we stopping first then, Carrots? Your place or mine?"

"I'm not sure I want to see the state of your place. We'll change at my apartment."

Nick shrugged again, leaning back into the seat. It felt... bigger than usual. But that was ridiculous, so he brushed the thought aside as he unbuttoned a bit of the uniform. It was hard to breathe in such a small thing.

It wasn't long before the duo arrived at the apartment and trudged up the stairs to to Judy's apartment.

Judy briefly felt around for her keys before realization struck.

"Dang it Nick, you have my keys."

Nick grinned widely, lifting them out of Judy's pockets. "So it would seem... What do you want for them?"

"Nick, come on, I don't want to be in your stupid shirt longer than I need to."

He gasped, putting a pawed hand on his tiny chest. "Carrots, that is a classic. I saved up a while for that little ensemble, thank you. You've probably been dragging it through the dirt all day, it barely fits you."

Judy paused for a confused second. This shirt and tie really shouldn't fit her... yet she had no trouble at all. Why was that....?

But the thought was quickly interrupted by the sound of Judy's annoying neighbors arguing once again.

"I'm telling you, the yogurt from 3rd street is much better!"

Bucky shoved a finger at Pronk angrily as they passed the police officers.

"You're insane, you are absolutely out of your mind. The 5th street grocery is much better."

"How can handle being so wrong without your brain exploding?!" Pronk quickly turned to Judy. "Neighbor, tell Bucky he wouldn't know taste if it ran him over."
11112.title: The crazier option, please!

choices: They go into Judy's apartment to change clothes before doing anything else
They stop to think about what other changes the stone could have done to them
111121.content:
"Well?" asked Pronk.

Nick didn't know what to do. For some odd reason, Judy's squabbling neighbours thought HE was Judy.

Finally he managed to stutter out: "Err..... personally, I prefer the yogurt from the shop of 7th Street...?"

Bucky and Pronk stared at Nick with wide eyes. Then they suddenly hurried out the door, calling back as they went out: "Thanks, Judy! We'll try it out right now!"

Nick and Judy stood dumbstruck after the two mammals had left. They then turned towards each other.

"Okay; that was weird," said Judy. "Why did they they think that you were me?"

"No idea, Carrots," answered Nick, "But for some reason, I just feel that there is something wrong; like, maybe that stone ended up swapping more than just our clothes."

"That's funny; I feel the same way," replied Judy. "Could be that the stone makes others percieve us as each other, or something."

Judy sighed. What should they do now?

11131221.content:
The apartment was suddenly overtaken by a violent red light and the pair was throw back in opposite directions.

"Omph!"

Judy hit the floor with a hard thud, causing the wind to get knocked out of her. The red stone stumbled from her paws and rolled under the bed.

As Judy laid sprawled out on the floor, her entire little rabbit body convulsed and jolted. It was like something was tugging at her from ear to tail and stretching her out like taffy. She could hear something rip and tear.

And then it all stopped in an instant.

Judy blinked a few times lying on the floor, before rising to a strange sense of vertigo. As she rose from, she looked down at herself only to find that she was looking quite exposed. Her vest and uniform lay in tatters all around her. It was almost as if she had exploded out of her clothing. At the thought of being indecent, her first instinct was to cover herself with her paws as she realized she hadn't been the only one to be hit by whatever that was.

"Nick!"

Despite being nearly naked, Judy rose for the door only to find her center of gravity was completely out of whack. She stumbled on her oversized feet and reached for the nearby desk...Only to find it much lower than she thought it would be. In fact, glancing around the room, everything looked a little bit smaller than she remembered it, even despite her apartment's miniature status.

That's when it dawned on her. It wasn't the apartment that had shrunk. It was she that had grown!

"Carrots," Nick responded from the hall.

"Are you alright?" Judy called.

She would have normally rushed for the door to make sure her friend was alright, but it was for her own safety that she was keeping herself steady. Her head was loopy and she wasn't prepared for the sight she saw in the doorway.

While she had grown, on the opposite end of the spectrum her partner had seemingly shrunk. He stood before her in a uniform that was far too big for him while the last shreds of her clothing remained pressed to her body to keep her covered. In fact, it was almost like the two of them had...

"Nick," Judy spoke up. "Did we...?"

"Switch heights?" asked Nick, tugging his now very loose shirt up his shoulder. "It certainly looks that way. But how?"

Something in Judy's keen detective mind clicked and she went down on her knees to reach under her bed. That proved to be an easier feat with such longer arms and her fingers grasped hold of her hunch. The now pulsing red stone.

"...Have you ever heard of something like this before?" asked the now giant bunny.

"A very long time ago," said the shrunken fox. "When I was a kid from a few crazy hobos. But I certainly didn't think something like this existed. I know I certainly didn't pay attention to rumors about magical stones."

"Do you know someone who might?"

"Maybe," he shrugged, giving up the fight to wear his shirt and just letting it slide off his shoulder into a heap on the floor. "Course, if it was just me, I would finagle with the thing and fix this myself."

"Out of the question. We need to bring this to the ZPD...I think."

Nick just shrugged, standing in a pile of his formerly fitting clothes. "It's your call, Carrots."

Judy often had to make the decisions in their pairing. But, in this case, she didn't quite know what to do. She sighed and sat her expanded body down on the floor to think for a moment before deciding to...
11131221.title: Switching Sizes

choices: Nick attempts to return the duo to thier original sizes.
Nick declines and mantains they research the stone further first.
Nick declines and Judy uses it once again.
111312211.content:
"You know what, you're right Nick. We should give it another go, maybe it can reset this whole situation?" Judy said after mulling it over a bit more and wildly gesturing to her and Nick's bodies with her thickened arms and enlarged paws.

"Yeah? Ok that sounds like a plan!" Nick answered with weak confidence sounding shaken by the strangeness of looking up at his formally "small" partner to meet her gaze.

"Right." Judy concured but wore a look of confusion.

"So how do we activate it?" Nick asked timidly.

"Hummmm, not quite sure. All I remember from last time was thinking what a hard headed fox you were and that you never seem to listen to me" Judy thought outloud as she gripped the still glowing stone while closing her eyes.

As she tried to recall how to activate the stones power once again she continued "I thought if I was larger you would have no choice but to take me seriously, but not only that but if you were meeker than you might find me more commanding maybe even a little indimidating". All the whlie the glow of the stone intensified and began to shine brightly threw the fox sized rabbit's fingers before setting of a blinding flash once again.

Judy raised her free paw up to her eyes to shield them from the brightness as she stumbled backward onto her rear. She managed to hold on to the stone this time but this caused a strange sensation to occur, she phyiscally felt the stone seemingly shrink in her paw.

Nick was flown back by the discharge again, only this time he was tossed with much more force. He could hear the sound of fabric streching poping and tearing from where Judy was and he aimed his sights there as soon as he was able. "Carrots! You ok?" Nick blurted out as his vison slowly retured.

Judy watched in horror/amazement as her body swelled even larger as her rump took up more and more of her apartments real estate upon the floor as it spread in all directions. "Uh Nick, I've got some bad news." Judy said nervously.

Nick finally able to see was flabberguasted by the sight before him. Judy was HUGE! Now she was big before and Nick hadn't gotten to his feet yet but something definatly didn't look right. "I think I see what you mean." Nick replied with trepidation hoping once he was standing things wouldn't look as bad as they appear to be.

As Nick gathered the courage to take the stand and approach the oversized bunny he braced for the worst. Upon donig so he was met with two revelations. One as he got to his feet the rabbits appartment floor wasn't all that far below him and for that matter everything about her appartment was oversized. The countertops were almost as tall as he was and her coffe table was up to the top of his thighs! Two Judy herself was truly MASSIVE he barely cleared the top of her head and she was sitting down!

It was clear Judy had grown again as Nick had shrank even smaller. Judy had been proped up against the wall with one arm over her rasied knee footplanted firmly on the floor while the other lay limp with the pulsating stone loosely in her open palm next to the corosponding leg outstretched and foot strait up.

As the giant rabbit got to her feet the fox truly felt small indeed, "Oh boy Nicky, what are we going to do? You seem so tiny now, can you even see over my counters? Ha ha!" the huge rabbit quiped with levity. Her form rised higher and higher still as she finally reached her "new" full height, with Nick comparitively shrinking lower and lower until his eye level settled around her lower abdomen. Now being only inches away form her Nick wasn't quite prepared for the spectacle so he found himself retreat ever so slightly "Uh y-yeah carrots I guess so. Huh hu." Nick stated as he laughed nervously.

With her ears merely inches from the ceiling while picking up on Nick's apprehension she tried to put him at ease by proclaiming, "Holy mackerel Nick, look at me I must be the size anatolain shepherd. This is nuts!"

"Yes you are quite large Judy especially to me, but I'm not so sure I want to have to look old Finnick in the eye next time I see him." Nick stated bluntly wincing at the thought of such a scenario.

"Or I could use it again and you can police the streets of Little Rodetia, you could be our inside fox. There sure is a whole lot of crime we just don't see in that town, it could really help the ZPD." Judy said in a joking tone that got more and more serious as she got lost in thought.

"Maybe you should worry about covering yourself up first, your not leaving much to the imagination you know!" Nick scolded her absentmindedness while gesturing to her completely tatered clothing and turning to face away.

The towering rabbit turned slightly red at the thought of her exposure and quickly removed her shredded garments and covered herself with a bedsheet. "You could have spoke up sooner perv.Besides if you hadn't noticed your not exactly decent yourself!" Judy said angrily.

"I know I know, but I'm not nearly 6 feet tall now am I. I think I could get away with it far better than you can. Anyway I'm sorry but I hadn't actually noticed until you stood ALL THE WAY UP! Nick explained while spreading his arms apart vertically sounding truly sorry to calm the behemoth buuny down not wanting to escalate her clear anger further.

"Sorry Nick, I know this must be tough and you did turn away so I was out of line." Judy appologized with deep regret.

'It's OK Carrots, what do you want to do? Maybe since you've seemingly figured it out you could use the stone to reset our sizes!" Nick stated in a hopeful tone.

"Yeah maybe, but don't you think we should look into it first so we don't make a ireversable mistake?" Judy asked in ernest.

"We could do that, I believe this fits the tale of the Wishing Stone to a T. So we could start there." Nick states recalling and old legend he heard as a cub.

"Wishing Stone eh, that sounds about right. Say I got an idea maybe you could use it to reset our sizes so we don't run into the whole "it can only grant three wishes" thing." Judy spoke normally until it got to the inner quote whereshe embelished with a silly voice before finishing.

"Ha ha, It's not a genie Carrots or at least that's not how the legend goes. Yeah I could do that just to be on the safe side." Nick said matter-o-factly clearly amused by the rabbit.

"It's settled then, here take the stone "little" fox." Judy said with a toothy grin cleary loving this situation, hamming it all the way up with her delivery.

As she held out the stone out to the dwindled fox he couldn't help but belt out, "Wow it's so BIG!"

"What my paw or the stone?" Judy intriguingly inquired.

"Well both, I suppose!" Nick answered quickly even though he hadn't given the stone that much thought.

"Yeah I guess to you everything is BIG, however this stone is looking kinda dinky now but you can fix that now can't you?" Judy idulged sweetly while anticipating Nick's next move.
111312211.title: Trial and Error

choices: Yes, supersized Nick and tiny Judy!
Nope, they return to.. Somewhat normal. Same size fox and bunny!
1113122111.content: But does he try to take some extra size for himself?
1113122111.title: Nick attempts to return the duo to thier origin...

choices: Find someone else to steal height from.
Try to see what else the orb can do.
1113122113.content:
"So, how did this work for you, exactly?" Nick asked, staring up at Judy. "What did you do to trigger it again, Carrots?"

"I just thought about what it would be like to be the tall and intimidating one, for a change. It's really strange but you have to really feel the wish or it won't work. Or, at least, that's what it seems like."

Nick pondered Judy's words as he did some quick math. Each wish seemed to drop him at half his size each time. If he wasn't counting his ears, he stood at about 80 centimeters tall while Judy was closer to 60. If Judy made the wish twice, that would mean he went from 40 centimeters to his current height of 20 centimeters. And that 60 centimeters of lost height went straight to Judy, who effectively doubled in her normal size. No wonder Judy looked 6 feet tall! Nick was currently standing at much less than a foot in height, while Judy was just a hair shy of four feet.

The numbers boggled Nick's mind as he looked up at Judy. At this height, he didn't even come up to her knees! There was a whole lot of bunny to love and the stone, which had been like a billiard ball when Nick first saw it was more like a medicine ball now in his paws. He had to use both of them as he lifted it up for Judy.

"Actually, Carrots, I think this is better off in your capable paws."

"What do you mean? Don't you want to get big again?"

"Hey, maybe there is something to the idea of policing Rodentia," Nick laughed as he tried not to stare too long as Judy's towering form. "World's first mouse-sized cop."

"I don't think you're quite mouse-sized yet," Judy commented as she effortlessly hoisted what was a giant ball from Nick's paws. "In fact, what if...?"

She played with the orb for a moment and was able to now perfectly clench it in her paws. Then Judy gave a wicked smile before she closed her eyes.

There was a growing flash again as Nick closed his eyes. Though he was not knocked back this time. Judy had gotten so big that she was able to contain the force of the stone all in the palm of her paw. No sooner than when Nick opened his eyes was he overcome with a familiar sinking sensation as the world around him got a lot more bigger. He dropped deeper into the pile of his own clothes as he lost another half of his dwindling height and he now stood mere inches tall.

Judy was doing her own growing in the other corner of the room. Granted, the stone had less mass to transfer over to her, though it was still enough that her ears were pressed down from the ceiling before her head finally bumped it. She giggled slightly as Nick now barely came up to her ankles. The bedsheet wrapped around her was just hanging on by a thread. She was now 130 centimeters tall, while he was a measly 10.

"There we go," she said. "The first mouse-fox."

Finnick would be jubilant if he could see Nick in this state. Nick had always given the small fox trouble, now he was barely the size of an action figure. Though, somehow, he really enjoyed seeing Judy tower over him.

"Here," she said, reaching down with her free paw and opening it like a platform. "Climb aboard."

Nick swallowed and did as commanded, standing shakily on Judy's paw. He lost his balance as she raised him up to her level. It was like riding the world's fuzziest elevator. From his eyes, Judy was the size of a small apartment building. And the room they were in was like a giant stadium.

"Carrots," Nick finally managed to find his tongue. "This is so...Surreal."

"I know," Judy replied, holding him up to her face so she could hear him. "I didn't think I'd wake up today and be able to hold you in my palm."

Nick blushed slightly as he stared at her massive lips. "Well, uh, I think I figured out what this stone really does. Every time you use it, I seem to lose half of my height. And then it gets transferred to you. So, it's not really a Wishing Stone more than it is..."

"An Absorbing Stone..."

Judy finished his thought as she held up the Stone in her other paw. Nick gawked that it was now about half as big as he was. To think he had be carrying that around like a toy mere moments ago...Now he didn't even think he could lift it up in his state.

111312211322.content:
"You're right," Judy nodded along. "An elephant might be too big, at first. I mean look at me, I can barely fit in here as it is."

That much was true. Judy was like a building from Nick's eyes, though he knew that just meant he was very small. But even with their differences in height, she kept bumping around the furniture meant for someone half her current size. She had to constantly lean over so she didn't bump her head on the ceiling. Nick shuddered to think what she might be like at full height.

“That said,” Judy continued, a mischievous smile at her lips. “I still want to get even bigger though.”

“How big are we talking?”

“Big enough,” she winked at him causing Nick to shiver with excitement slightly. “Perhaps somewhere so I don’t have to go too far. I think walking around like this is going to certainly raise a few eyes.”

“At least until we find clothes that fit you.”

As if on cue, there was some noise in the hallway. Nick had been to Judy’s place long enough to know that she didn’t have the greatest neighbors when it came to volume. Being mouse-sized, however, the shouting match of Bucky and Pronk was intimidating to hear, especially with the holes in Judy’s wall.

Judy’s usual frown whenever the two came home suddenly lightened up as she had an idea.

“What if we tried it on them?” Judy whispered. “I could use a bit of revenge on the two of them and them being smaller might quiet things down.”

Bucky and Pronk were a kudu and a gemsbok respectively, each standing roughly 170 centimeters or 5’7 each. And they were both about the same height the last time Nick saw them. Judy looked down at Nick in her paw.

“What do you think?”

“I suppose it could be nice to have some revenge on your noisy neighbors,” Nick started, he still wasn’t sure if he was on board with making Judy a giant or not yet. “But bursting through the door like this might raise some questions. Granted, you’re still smaller than them. But they’re pretty observant, last I saw.”

“Hmm,” Judy thought aloud. “Well, if I can’t burst in then why don’t you sneak over and sneak the size for me?”

“Huh? Me? How?”

“Easy! You’re small enough to fit in through the holes in the wall now! You can just creep over with the stone and catch them by surprise. Then head back with the stone when you’re giant again. Then you can give the stone back and I can take the size you have.”

That was a complicated plan, but Nick could see it working. The problem was, did he want to go through with it or just have Judy burst in and steal their heights? Or maybe there was another way they weren’t thinking of?

1113122113221111.content:
"Well...Actually..." Judy let out a massive yawn. Nick felt a cold sweat ran down Nick's back as he realized she was getting big enough to swallow him whole. "I'm really tired now. It was a long day."

Nick could relate to that. Growing had taken a lot of energy out of him, probably because their body's muscles and bones had to stretch and expand at a rapid rate. Shrinking was kind of the opposite and left Nick feeling very energized like a small child. Judy, however, had been doing nothing but growing the whole time. And growing quite a lot, at that. At 180 centimeters, she was standing three times as tall as she normally did.

Nick could only watch as she leaned back with her head on the bed, now using it as a pillow instead of its intended purpose of a mattress not that she could fit on it anymore.

"You can't be serious," Nick stammered at the bunny that was four times as big as he was. "Carrots, come on now. This has been fun but it's time to get things back to normal!"

She pretended not to hear him, closing her eyes and faking a snore until she actually did fall asleep. She was so exhausted from growing that she almost instantly passed out, the orb still clasped tightly within her paws. Nick was left dumbstruck at the sight of the sleeping giant, now far too small to be wearing any of his clothes and covering his lower body with his tie.

He couldn't believe that Judy was being this selfish. That rock must have been doing something to her head. Nick sighed as he knew what he had to do.

"I gotta get that thing back," he muttered. "Before this gets even more crazier."

Forgoing his shame, Nick began his long ascent up Judy's body, starting with her legs. He was careful not to use his claws so he wouldn't wake her, but she was out pretty cold. Though he still froze every time she breathed in funny before continuing his climb. He just had to get to her paw in his pint-sized state and free the orb from her clutches. The only question was if Nick was going to be sneaky enough to get the stone and make his wish to shrink Judy down to size a little.

What would happen?

Using Nick's clothes left behind in the room, she was only slightly bigger than he typically was. That made his outfit the best choice to wear as she made her way to the station. Thankfully, no one gave her a second look as she slipped down to the locker rooms to find herself a bigger uniform she could wear, being 50% bigger than she usually was.

As she grabbed something for someone 90 centimeters tall, she was greeted by a sly voice around the corner.

"I see what you mean, Carrots. It's rather nice to be living large for a change."

Judy fought a groan as she once again found herself looking up at Nick. She hated to admit it to herself, but she rather liked having to look down at him. Given that she had been 180 centimeters last night and Nick had been 45 before she went to sleep, that placed him in the range of 135 centimeters. Much larger than what he had previously been at. Judy noted that he seemed to be wearing his own new uniform, meant for more a wolf or ram in sizing.

"Laugh it up," Judy replied, adjusting to her new uniform. "What did you do with the stone anyway?"

"That's for me to know and you to find out. Lucky for you, we have work right now. Else I would take us home and fix this. Double lucky for us that no one seems to notice our little growths. They're so used to looking down at us, even being fifty percent bigger isn't much change."

"It would if we used the stone..."

"Forget about the stone. Let's just get through today so we can fix this later."

And with that, the two of them made their way to the center of the station.

It was another busy day, with everyone off doing their own things that they didn't notice the oversized bunny and fox respectively. No one, that was, until the pair approached the front where a rather morose looking cheetah sat dejected. Judy broke from Nick to check up on their friend, much to Nick's annoyance who would rather go through the day keeping conversations to a minimum so they wouldn't get caught.

"Hey Clawhauser!" Judy called, liking the fact that she no longer had to stand on her tippie toes to reach the front desk. "What's wrong?"

"Huh," Clawhauser before doing a double take at the two. "Did you guys get taller?"

"It's just because you're sitting down," Nick dismissed before changing the subject. "What's eating you, big guy?"

"Oh," blubbered the cheetah. "It's Bogo, I guess. He caught me listening to the new Gazelle album at work and confiscated it. But I think he's just listening to it himself."

"That's horrible," Judy said. "Clawhauser, you need to stand up to him. He shouldn't bully you."

"I would, but have you seen the guy? I mean I know I'm big, but he's a giant compared to me."

That much was true. Clawhauser stood at around 170 centimeters while Bogo towered over all of them at 250. And even he was on the small size compared to some of the rhinos and elephants in the precinct. As Nick frowned in sympathy for their friend, Judy's face suddenly lit up with an idea.

"Nick," she whispered in his ear. "Can you bring out the stone again?"

"For the last time, we're not using it to make you bigger, Carrots."

"I didn't say that! I just wanted to help Clawhauser get his album back from Bogo. And to do that, I wanted to have..."

"Nick, it's me! Open up!"

He unlocked the door and did a double take as he realized he had to look up to her. He had been a giant in her eyes before, standing at 220 centimeters when she was a measly 5. But now, he barely came up to her chin.

"...You didn't," he said, realizing what she had probably done to get such height.

"I'm sorry!" she said, moving inside to shut the door. "But I got the album back."

"Oh, and I'm sure Bogo just thought that him shrinking down to the size of an ant is completely normal and in no way won't blow his stack at us. Carrots, this has gone on too long already. We have to come clean about this and fix things! Maybe he won't completely lose his mind if we grow him back to normal."

"I know," she admitted with a wince. "I just hope we don't get fired over this."

"Good. Now, let me put on some clothes that fit and we can make our way back to his office and fix this."

125321.content:
It was another blistering day in Sahara Square as our favorite cop duo, Nick Wilde and Judy Hopps, were writing up a truck that had slammed into a fire hydrant.

Judy was busy giving her typical rant at the driver for being so careless and endangering people while Nick just sat back and watched her work, writing up the ticket. He had the easy job in comparison and the poor camel driver in question was looking worse than if he had been in an actual bad accident. Nick finished up early enough and passed the time by looking at the name on the semitrailer. Mumbo's Magical Devices.

"Huh," Nick couldn't help but say to himself. "There's a first. A name I don't know in Zootopia."

The cabin was undamaged, but the back had taken a dent and the doors had swung open. Thankfully, only one box had spilled out onto the street and the driver had been quick to pick it up. A few loose items that looked like TV remotes had scattered on the road, but Nick didn't pay it much mind. The camel looked more concerned about the state of his package rather than his actual truck.

"...And don't do it again," Judy said, putting on her best impression of Bogo.

With his head hung low, the camel returned to his cabin and pulled out onto the road while Judy continued to direct traffic. Nick went to inspect the hydrant, now that the truck had moved, but thankfully there had been no damage done to the hippo-sized water container. Though Nick noticed something else on the ground.

"Huh, guess the poor guy missed one."

It was far too late to flag the driver down, with him having sped off. Nick figured they would trace it back to the company owner eventually as he thumbed at the device.

It certainly looked like a TV remote at a glance, though it only had two buttons. A plus sign and a negative sign.

"This had to be the worst remote control I've ever seen," he muttered to no one in particular.

Without much of a thought, he thumbed at the buttons. Who wouldn't, after all. Nick absentmindedly clicked the plus sign in a general direction, and that direction just so happened to be Judy Hopps. To his surprise, an almost invisible bolt of lightning shot from the top of the remote and straight at Judy without her even noticing it.

The bolt struck her right in the...

Nick winced as he watched the electric bolt strike Judy right in her presented posterior. He was waiting for her to give some kind of yelp, with mammals have been victim to more than a few cases of static shock before. Only that didn't seem to happen.

The bolt instead arced into Judy's already shapely bottom (yes, Nick could admit to looking for time to time). There it was absorbed in almost a blink of an eye. Nick quickly hid the remote behind his back, afraid someone might notice what happened. Judy certainly didn't and it was a good thing too as Nick's eyes drifted below the equator. His jaw dropped like when she had busted him for tax evasion.

There was no kind way to say it. Judy's butt was inflating.

It was like someone had taken an air pump and used it several times, like in the cartoons, all focused on her rear end. Her tail went straight up as there was slightly more space for it to be resting on. Indeed, her rump was starting to look more like a shelf for her cottontail. But then, just as suddenly as it had begun, it stopped.

"Nick?" Judy must have realized he had been staring at her. "Is something wrong?"

Somehow Judy remained blissfully aware that there was significantly more of her down below. Nick to process all that had happened in the span of a few seconds before she starting asking the wrong questions. Somehow, he had gotten his paws on a magical remote that could...Well, inflate people. And he had just used it on his partner, making her more pleasing to the eye.

With her walking in front of him, it took an immense amount of self control to not look down at her inflated tush. Nick passed the time time thumbing at the remote behind his back. When they were out of sight from anyone and Nick was sure that they would not be overheard, he cleared his throat.

1253211333.content:
Judy continued to keep her eyes shut as a wave of excitement passed over her. She could barely contain herself as she waited patiently for Nick to make his decision, all the while battling with herself. Indeed, her thoughts were something of a war zone. The rational part of her was telling herself that this was impossible. Mammals didn't just inflate. Yet, here it was. The ability to make anyone bigger with just the push of a button.

She would never admit it to anyone, but she hated the fact that she was always the small one. Even among rabbits, she was rather shorter and skinny. Her parents called it the "runt of the litter" syndrome, which is why they attributed it to Judy's need to do dangerous things like being a cop. That deep longing to be seen as one of the bigger mammals developed into something more pronounced when she reached adolescence, like a secret obsession as she found herself drawn to curious things like the scene in the blueberry scene in Willy Woofa and the Chocolate Factory. Though it wasn't until a few months of living in the city that she stumbled across something that truly defined her interest. They didn't have much in the way of internet on the farm, after all.

Through careful research, she discovered that there was a society within mammal culture which fantasized about inflating themselves into giant balloons. Judy once laughed at the prospect, until she found it fascinating enough to fall down the literal rabbit hole. Suddenly, she was immersed in what amounted to a secret internet cult, making an anonymous persona and infiltrating several groups for various catered specifics that caught her eye. She approached the matter with the same vigor and determination as she did anything she set her mind to and rather ambitiously made a name for herself rather quickly.

In short, she had become a closet inflation fetishist in the span of a few months.

Those first few days were intense, scouring the catalogue of various artists and writers who had pooled collective works together in the many unsavory and deviant places on the internet. Over time, she developed a refined taste and could hunt down exactly what she knew scratched her particular itch. More often than not, she would spend her work hours daydreaming of what might await her back at the apartment when she had alone time. She wouldn't dare use the work computer for such activities, after all. It was only when she had become situated enough that she would begin fantasying what it would be like with her as the intended victim. To become bigger, bloated, balloony, full, and swollen. There were several brave mammals she had seen videos of who would actually use a hose in the most inglorious ways to achieve a partial real life effect. But nothing like the dream.

It was for that reason why Judy found herself shaking with anticipation as Nick pulled the trigger and let her wildest fantasies come true.

Judy yelped and brought a paw to her belly. Now that she was really focusing on it, she could feel it happen as the bolt of electricity from the remote settled into her stomach to do its business. What followed was a rising sense of pressure akin to what might happen if one drank a whole liter of soda in one sitting. It was like having a burp that couldn't quite get out. And with that growing pressure came a fullness like eating a very hefty meal. And just when Judy felt like her stomach couldn't hold anymore of whatever she was filling up with, she broke beyond her limit. That was when the swelling started.

There was a tightness in her lower abdomen that caused her to panic slightly until she realized it was her belt cutting into her growing stomach. It looked as if she was taking her deepest breath out, and try as she might she couldn't suck the gut back in. Instead it only pushed forward at a steady and comfortable pace. Judy quickly undid the strap of her utility cord and was met with instant relief as her inflated stomach surged forward a few inches. To the unknowing observer, it might look like she was a few months pregnant. Her fur was tight as a drum beneath her jumpsuit, yet somehow it was able to keep stretching like it was made of elastic.

As she felt around her growing new addition, she bit back a moan. Her paws traced around her expanding girth, finding unfamiliar curves as she explored herself. The surprise came when she found her hips were also growing outwards, giving her a distinctly pear shaped silhouette. There was the faintest sound of a hiss in the air, if she listened closely enough.

She could feel when the experience stopped, her body settling into place to accommodate her enhanced attributes. It was almost disappointing were it not for how tight and stretched out Judy was feeling already from the experience.

Nick looked just as fascinated in the expansion as she was as he lowered the remote. "How do you feel?"

Judy bounced on the balls of her feet, expecting there to be some heavy resistance with so much more of her taking up her point of view. The laws of mass told her that she should be weightier and bulky, but she didn't feel that way at all. More like the opposite.

"Light," Judy commented. "Almost like I'm filling up with air."

Indeed, a pat on her stomach caused a hollow noise to resonate from her touch. Nick continued to step around in the background, looking over his shoulder.

"Alright," he said. "I pressed the button. Now we gotta get you back to normal before someone sees."

Judy was suddenly overtaken by an irrational rush of fear, like the thought she might lose something. She had finally gotten to be big, or at least bigger, and the idea of someone taking that away from her was enough to abandon all logical thought.

"Wait," she bargained. "Just one more press. Then we can go back."

"Wow. You must really like this, huh?"

"Don't you?" Judy asked, showing off her new curves. "You're the one who picked this part of me to grow, after all."

"Oh, don't you guilt me into this. You were practically begging me for it. How come I gotta be the responsible one here? You're messing with our group dynamics."

"Please, Nick," she put on the best face she could to warm his heart.

Nick groaned and aimed the remote at her again before saying...

12532113332.content:
"How about you go to normal for now?" Nick asked, pulling back the remote as soon as Judy made a jump for it. "But then we play with this in private? You know? When we're off duty and not lurking in the alleyway like a couple of goons?"

As much as Judy loathed to admit it, Nick had a point. She had almost lost herself entirely to the rush of fulfilling her deepest fantasy. And now that she was settling down for a minute and thinking rationally, she could look down at herself and feel rather exposed. In that embarrassment, she started to cover herself like she was standing there naked.

"Point taken," she muttered, trying to hide the blush in her ears. "Is this weird, Nick?"

"Weird doesn't even begin to describe it," he replied. "But the good kind of weird. I didn't think you'd be into this sort of thing. Heck, I didn't even think I would be. But here we are. And it can be our little secret if you want it to be. Or you want to just do it on your own, I would totally get that."

"No," the blush spread from Judy's ears to her face. "I kinda like having you here. As a measure of control in case I go nuts."

"I think we both know that there's no stopping you if you set your mind to something," Nick chuckled as he held up the remote. "Ready?"

Judy inspected herself one last time. She still felt like a tick ready to pop, but it was rather soothing being like this if a bit strange. Nick had put it best, it was the good kind of weird. Like scratching a particular she didn't even know she had. She gripped a pawful of her bloated belly, letting it wobble in place before sighing.

"Do it."

~

It was almost bizarre being back to normal, even though she hadn't been inflated for all that long. When she was swollen, she felt bigger like for once she didn't have to worry about getting stepped on in the city. Being deflated left her feeling empty, almost. Everything was heavier again, even if it was only slightly. And it only made the day drag on.

What followed was the longest day in the ZPD that Judy had ever experienced, her first day on parking duty being a close second. More than once Judy had felt the urge to go to Nick and find out where he had hidden the remote so she could use it and scratch that deep-seeded itch that seemed to be growing with every passing minute. But she remained professional and dutiful, never once letting her desires take control and completing everything that was assigned to her in her typical speed.

Five o'clock rolled around and Nick did the usual after work ritual. They met at the steps of the ZPD, hopped on the same bus together, and left for home. The difference this time, however, was that Nick got off with Judy at her stop.

"So, how long have you been into this?" Nick asked as they entered the relative quiet of her apartment. Buck and Pronk were out on a date tonight, meaning they would have some privacy for a few hours.

"Is it that obvious?"

"Considering you didn't immediately freak out, you're either remarkably calm and rational all the time, which trust me you're not, or you have an interest what this thing does." Nick held up the remote, which he had kept hidden all day. "Speaking of which, when we're done tonight we should probably done some research into this thing."

"I know," Judy groaned. "And you're right. About both things. To answer your original question...I dunno. I guess always? But I didn't really know until recently."

"Well, I guess we're both novices here then," Nick undid the knot of his tie. "So, how do you want to do this then?"

Judy had been thinking about this all day. She suddenly had the power to fulfill her ultimate deviant fantasies right at her fingertips, there was so much she wanted to do with it. To narrow it all down on a place to begin was almost laughable. But she could think of one initial goal in mind.

"I want to be able to float," she announced.

"Like a balloon?"

"I was feeling lighter when I was bigger," Judy patted her now flatter stomach. "I know it's possible, even if it doesn't make physical sense. But there was also a limit I was feeling too."

"You think you'll pop?"

"I don't know," Judy admitted. "But I feel like the first step is going to be to try and see what that limit is. See how big I can get at first."

"Hope we have enough space in your apartment then."

Judy appreciated a little humor in all this as she removed her work vest in favor of slipping into something a little more comfortable for the activities they were about to do. She settled for a robe, loose enough not at all constricting so there would be plenty of room to grow without ruining her clothes. As she returned from the bathroom changed, she found Nick waiting for her with his own clothes disheveled to get comfortable. She bit her lip in anticipation of the moment of truth. How big could she get at this stage?

When Nick would finally press the button, she would grow to...
12532113332.title: Playtime for Later

125321133322.content:
"Ready?"

"Ready."

"Are you sure?"

"I'm pretty sure, Nick..."

"Really, really sure--"

"Nick, this is torture. Just do it already!"

Judy knew by now that Nick was just fooling around to relieve some of the tension in the air. She couldn't deny that she was nervous too. They were friends, best friends. But this was the most intimate thing they had ever done together. There certainly was that same level of anticipation in the air. Not that Judy hadn't ever thought about it. Heck, even one of her daydreams had been something akin to this exact situation, only with a pump instead of a remote. Truthfully, she was overjoyed that she could share this with him. It felt close and personal, but he just had to ruin it by talking sometimes.

Without another second of warning, Judy was hit by the same bolt of electricity as in the alleyway.

Her paws shot to her gut, slightly growing beneath her robes, as Judy failed in hiding her surprised yelp. It was a gentler pressure than before, but it nevertheless was foreign. Almost immediately she felt as if she had eaten a very big dinner, despite having skipped the meal to jump into inflating herself. She briefly toyed with the idea of never having to eat again as a balloon before loosening her robe's belt. The speed at which she returned to the size she was before was quicker and even Nick noticed as he lowered the remote.

"It's happening faster now."

"I know," Judy said, patting at her exposed belly. "And I don't feel as full as the last time either."

"So, it's getting easier?"

"Yeah," a rather kinky idea crossed Judy's mind. "Nick, could you do me a favor? Could you just hold the button down until I say stop?"

"Isn't that a little dangerous?"

"A little bit. But that's kind of the fun, right?"

To sweeten the deal, Judy shouldered off her robe and dropped it to the floor. She was still wearing her underwear and sports bra, of course, but it was the most exposure the two of them had with her each other. She wasn't blind and though her nose wasn't as powerful as a canine's, she could detect her own little things too. Try as he might, Nick couldn't hide his own arousal from her as he shifted around on his feet. And even though she felt like a pumpkin with bunny legs, Judy clearly had his attention.

"Come on," she cooed with the right tone of voice. "I want to see how big I can get before it's too much. Don't you want to see that too?"

Nick thought for a moment before holding up the remote again. "Alright. But the safe word is watermelon."

Judy trembled as the bolt struck her again, only this time it continued to splash into her like a beam of violent blue light. It was almost like it was swirling within her before growing out in all directions. She was glad to have removed her robe, doing so allowed for a front row view of the changes going on in her entire body. Not just her potbelly, though that was certainly the epicenter of it all.

She put her two paws on her stomach and pressed down into the soft fur as it swelled between her fingertips. In a matter of seconds, she had gone beyond the point of looking pregnant and into the realms of cartoonishly distorted. Her hips and thighs were also starting to see some swelling to accommodate the extra growth, making her look more like a rabbit who had gained a lot of weight in a hurry.

Internally, the feeling was ecstasy. The feeling of fullness magnified a hundredfold, yet despite that there was a deep hollow feeling that kept growing with her size. The hissing she faintly heard earlier that day was steadily increasing in volume and taking a deeper pitch as there was more of the bunny to fill out. It felt like a thousand tiny hands tugging and pulling her skin in all directions like a gentle massage. And it was all so soft. The inflation seemed to make the flesh beneath the fur doughy and stretchy, like she was slowly being molding into rubber as a deeper force within her expanded and made room for itself in her body. Patting her taunt belly, Judy knew it was air that was moving around in her.

And it wasn't content with lingering around in just her lower body and stomach.

Judy's feet curled as the air built higher and higher on top of itself, spreading to all corners of her body. It came in the form of her chest looking puffy, when moments before it had been nonexistent. Her breasts were beginning to strain the clasps of her sports bra, which below her underwear was stretching to its very limits to keep up. Three key areas on her body began a focus. Butt, belly, and boobs. But even then, the growing didn't stop there. Her arms were starting to stiffen ever so slightly, all the way down to her fingers which puffed up like she was wearing gloves. Her legs were harder to keep together as her thighs and calves thickened as the swelling muscles in her groin started to inflate too. She even lost a little flexibility with her ears as they straightened up on top of her head and plumpened with the air coursing through her body. And it wasn't just outwards she was growing.

She noticed it when her breasts had expanded a few cup sizes and her torso was starting to look like a beachball. Nick didn't look quite as tall as she was used to seeing him. Judy held her breath, she was actually starting to get taller as well as rounder.

The inflation process seemed content with keeping her in the proportions she was in as the room around her started to look just a little bit smaller, her tiny apartment seeming just a bit more cramped. The sound of Judy's heartbeat pounded away in her ear, muted only by the continually hiss of air. Her bra was really starting to dig into her torso and her panties starting to look more like a g-string. She wanted to be even bigger, but instead she felt ready to burst.

"Watermelon!"

Nick released the button as Judy fell backwards, expecting to land hard on her swollen bottom. Instead she bounce a good foot in the air before hitting the wall.

"You okay?" Nick asked, tossing the remote to the side and offering her a paw to help her up.

Judy took it, noting how puffy her paws in comparison to his. But that wasn't the only thing different when she was brought to her feet. She beamed as Nick looked down at her feet.

"You're not standing on something, are you Carrots?"

"Nope," she grinned. "How's it feel to be standing eye to eye with a bunny?"

"Mmm. Pretty good from where I'm standing. How about this then?"

Judy let out a slight squeak as Nick grabbed her by the waist and hoisted her straight into the air effortlessly. He had been able to carry her before, but in his paws Judy truly felt like she was weightless.

"How much do you think I weight?" she had to ask.

"You were, what? Forty pounds before? Half that now, if I'm any judge. You're lucky we didn't do this outside, you'd go flying away in a strong breeze."

"Maybe that's the idea," she said, cupping his face with her chubby paws. His eyes were studying her with a certain hunger in them. "What do you want to do now with your balloon, slick?"

"I can think of a few things."
125321133322.title: Eye to Eye

choices: "Where's the remote?" (The remote has gone missing)
"Am I supposed to be able to do this?" (Judy develops the power to self-inflate)
1253211333222.content:
Nick woke up in a place he only daydreamed he might be, given how determined the two of them were to be "just friends" for the longest time until now.

Now, he blinked a few times and realized that he was in fact resting naked in Judy's apartment on her bed with a warm body pressed into him. He glanced down to find Judy in a similar state of undress looking a little smaller than he remembered her being from last night. The memories flashed over him of what they had been doing together and he distinctly remembered Judy being the size of him during all of that. Had Judy deflated in the middle of the night? Or had she managed to slip out of bed and change back with the remote?

He wasn't waiting long for an answer as Judy stirred awake herself.

"Good morning," she muttered, rubbing her eyes before looking down. "What happened? I'm small again."

"Guess that answers that question," Nick chuckled to himself. "Looks like sleeping it off caused you to lose all your air."

"Maybe," Judy looked a little upset before smiling. "Oh, well. It was still fun, right?"

"It was definitely an experience I won't soon forget. But yes, I had fun. Though we should probably discuss what that means now, between the two of us."

"Yeah..." Judy's voice trailed as she covered herself up with her tossed aside robe. "Raincheck on that? We should probably shower and get ready for work. But tonight...Tonight I want to talk about it."

That was good enough for Nick. It was a lot to take in all at once and truthfully he didn't know what he wanted out of it. A relationship or friends with benefits, it would require some thought when most of what they had been doing the night before had been pure instinct and sexual drive.

As she wandered to her shower, Nick passed the time gathering up his clothes and preparation for his turn. They had to wash the scent of themselves off or the whole office was going to start gossiping.

By the time that was done, he needed some coffee and prepped the burner while Judy turned off the water and was drying off. He listened to her pitter-patter of feet through the walls as they did a strange dance, like she was looking for something.

"Hey, uh, Nick?" she asked from the bathroom door.

"Yeah?"
1253211333222.title: Morning Surprises

choices: Judy makes it through the day without inflating.
Judy sneaks in some inflating during the workday.
Judy accidentally inflates during the workday.
12532113332222.content:
"Am I supposed to be able to do this?"

It was a simple question that carried a lot of concern in her tone. Nick's eyes glanced over to the bathroom door to be greeted by a sight he should have been used to by now, but was surprising all the same. Judy's rump was swollen like a bookshelf.

"What in the...?"

"I know, right?" Judy asked, showing off her inflated rear with a slight dance. "And where's the remote? There?"

Nick looked over to the nightstand to see the remote right where he had left it in the night before.

"But, wait," he said, picking it up. "If that's here then how did you...?"

"Well, I had a bit of a thought, right? Since last night I've been feeling kind of hollow. I can't explain it, but it's just like how I feel when inflated only muted. And you know how in the cartoons the character puts their thumb in their mouth and blows? And, well..."

She mimicked the same feat Nick had same a hundred times before on the Saturday morning television. With a deep breath, suddenly her stomach was at the same size it was with one click of the remote.

"Whoa...," Nick slumped down on the bed. "Do you think this has to do with the fact that you deflated last night?"

"I dunno. I wonder if I can get back to the same size as I was then."

"Hey, hey, hey, wait a sec, Carrots!"

He caught her mid breath as she looked confused for a moment, like it was the most obvious thing in the world to want to be bigger. Nick was wondering if this was a good thing for her.

"Look," Nick explained, holding up the clock from the nightstand. "We have like thirty minutes for me to shower and get to work or we'll miss the bullpen."

"We can afford to be five minutes late."

"Carrots, you never miss the bullpen. The minute the two of walk in late together from the same cab, everyone in the whole station is going to know about us."

By the twitch in Judy's face, Nick could tell that she wasn't quite ready to admit the next level of their relationship to the public yet either. Especially while they were still trying to figure things out for themselves.

"Besides that," continued Nick. "Have you thought about how you're going to get back to normal now that you're like that?"

Judy looked down at her bloated belly and butt. "Well...Maybe we can use the remote?"

"We don't know if it will work like that."

"Well, what if we called in sick?"

"Carrots, you're the star of the ZPD. Now you're looking into playing hooky over this? I don't think that's a good thing."

"I know! It's bad, but I just can't help it! Aren't you having fun too?"

"I am, and I think that's kind of the problem here. Look, this has been great, it really has. But we gotta be adults here and realize that we gotta keep this under wraps or we're going to get in a lot of trouble. We should have turned this thing in the moment we got it."

Nick aimed the remote at her and pressed the minus button. Judy frowned as her entire returned back to its normal shape and size.

"You're right...I'm sorry, Nick. This is just really exciting."

"I know it is. But come on, you can make it through the workday without inflating yourself, right? Please tell me you can, because I can't believe I ever I had to say that sentence before in my life."

"Alright, alright. I promise."

"Good," Nick continued to hold onto the remote as he rose from the bed. "Now, I gotta get in the shower so we can get moving or we might really be late for work."

It continued to floor Nick that he was going to have to be the responsible one, though he should have expected it given how Judy was known to behave when hot on a case. But the last thing he wanted to do was watch her get herself fired from the job she had worked so hard to get. He knew deep down she didn't mean to put her career at risk, she was just being distracted by these newfound powers of hers.

Nick just had to hope that she could control herself and get through the day without submitting to temptation.

And as the two went into work...
12532113332222.title: Passing on the Power

choices: Her butt inflates and she tries to hide it.
It's a medium inflation, but Clawhauser thinks she needs to lose weight.
It's a big inflation and Clawhauser panics.
125321133322223.content:
Judy thought waiting through work the day before was the worst, but it topped it knowing that inflating herself was just a thumb blow away. It was the first time that she wasn't fully invested in one of Bogo's bullpen talks, her mind kept going to dirty places and she found herself getting so flustered she had to excuse herself to the restroom to cool down over the sink.

"Doing good, Carrots," Nick called to her as they returned to their seats with their assignments in tow. "How do you feel?"

"Like a deflated balloon."

"So, so far so good then? At least we're lucky enough to get the follow up to that truck accident yesterday. I've been curious to find out what the deal is with this remote since we found it."

Nick placed the remote in his desk drawer and locked it up, tucking the key in his front pocket.

"That'll keep it from falling into the wrong paws. Now, want to give me some help with the research?"

"Yeah, yeah, yeah," Judy sighed as she leaned back into her chair. "I'm going to need some coffee if I'm going to get through this day without going crazy with boredom."

"Jeez, tell us how you really feel, Carrots. Get me a mug though while you're there."

She grunted and shuffled her way down the stairs to the kitchen.

One of the things that always bothered her about the ZPD was how it was clearly designed with no regard to smaller mammals in mind. It was cold comfort to think that one day she might be able to inflate herself large enough to be bigger than all of them. Though they would probably never see it.

As she arrived at the kitchen, she grunted trying to climb the counter meant for an elephant to get to the grinder. Then came the long and tedious process of collecting the beans and assembling everything. As she kicked the machine on, she took a careful glance around the room over the loud grinding noise. Surely no one was going to notice if she did a little inflation. She could control it enough to escape notice. She had to master this new power eventually anyway. Just a small one.

Judy took a deep breath and...

"Hi, Judy!"

The sudden shrill voice of Clawhauser pierced even the coffee grinder. And it was sharp enough that Judy's breath was altered, causing a bit more inflation than she might have intended. The question was, how severe would her accidental inflation be?
125321133322223.title: Accidental Inflation

1253211333222232.content:
Judy felt the rush of air push every part of her out in all directions as her police uniform suddenly became uncomfortably tight. She was only fortunate that Clawhauser couldn't quite see her from atop of the counter. It was only when he could grab a nearby stool that he could get the full view of her.

"Oh em goodness," he said, putting a concerned paw over his mouth. "Jude, I had no idea the doughnuts would be that fattening for a little bunny!"

"Clawhauser," Judy tried to protest before deciding against it. "...Yes. Bunnies have incredibly high metabolism. You've never seen a rabbit so much as have more than a carrot, right?"

"Yeeeeah?"

"Well, I'll burn all this off in a couple of days. We bulk up fast and run it off faster. So, don't even worry about it and just forget you saw me. Okay?"

"Of course, Judy. I'm just here to get some coffee. I'd offer you another doughnut, but...You know."

She let out a nervous laugh and forgot about the coffee cups and her whole reason for going to the kitchen in the first. She had a bigger problem to worry about.

Marching past the refrigerator, she could see a reflection of herself and determine the damage. She was about halfway between her full size when she last tried it the last night. It was clearly noticeable, though not if anyone was looking at her out of the corner of their eye. As she continued out of the kitchen, she determined that she had to get back to Nick and thus get the remote back before someone with enough knowledge of bunny biology saw her. Nick was right, she had been playing too loose and confident with these new powers. She would have to apologize when she saw him.

The real problem was getting to him without being seen.

With the bullpen meeting over, the office was in full swing with wandering eyes in every corner. She would have to go in a roundabout way to get back to him, though there was no telling where that might lead. There were some parts of the station Judy had never even been before. But on the plus side, there wouldn't be a lot of through traffic. One of those passages had to go back to the offices where Nick ways. Then again, there was always the vents. Normally, Judy might be able to squeeze into them with no problem. But she wasn't sure if she was going to get stuck or not in her current state.

Or she could just throw caution to the wind and risk the most direct route.

There was one sure way Judy could think of to avoid being seen entirely and that was through the ventilation of the station. Plus it ran through every corner of the ZPD, all she would have to do is find the right path and she would literally be right on top of Nick. Without wasting anymore time, she ducked behind a nearby fern just as Fangmeyer and Wolfard passed her by unnoticed. She was going to have to make this quick.

Using her claws, she carefully began to unscrew the door to the shaft before her. She rolled inside as soon as she heard someone approach her.

"Omph," Judy said to herself as she squeezed deeper into the vents. "Tighter than I thought."

Given that she was mostly filled with air at this point, she felt like a balloon that was being compressed. With her hips being the largest part of her, the cramped space was causing the air to travel to other available areas where there was space. Namely her chest.

Judy blushed as she saw her typically nonexistent breasts bloomed bigger from the sudden shift in position. She could hear the fabric of her uniform stretch to hold everything together.

"I'm going to have to remember that trick for later," Judy whispered to herself.

She crawled deeper into the vents, painting a mental image for herself of the station layout. Every so often, she would pass by an opening on the floor or walls, allowing her to glance outside and judge her location. She also couldn't help but notice that the further along she went, the smaller the vents seemed to feel. Before long, she was on her paws and knees struggling to budge through until she couldn't move another inch.

"Great," she said to herself trying to retreat but finding her new assets wedged between the walls. "I'm stuck..."

By her estimates, she was only a little ways from where Nick's desk was. She could risk calling for help, but that might bring the trouble she was trying to avoid. Judy doubted Bogo would look kindly on her using the vents, inflated or otherwise. Then again, she could try to inflate herself out of the problem. Maybe that might generate enough to force to push herself through the tight spot she was in. Or she could always try her best to deflate.

Judy decided to...
12532113332222322.title: Stuck in the Vents
